channel.title: Help with uptime and online players
channel.description: hi, is there anyone that can talk me through how to add my server's uptime and online players under my quest tab please send me a tut link or talk me through it thanks bye. :)

item.title: Help with uptime and online players
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, you can declare a variable for the uptime in the server class, and on the process method (IN SERVER.JAVA. If it has none, then in PlayerHandler.java), increase it by one. To get the minutes, divide it by 120, or by 2 and then 60.

For the players, you can loop through the max players, and store their player names (If the player is actually a player) in a String array for further use (So this way you can do something like onlinePlayers[0], and that would get the first player it found to be online).

Read full topic
item.source: Help with uptime and online players
